alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Macon; Overton; Smith; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:23AM CDT until April 01 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OVERTON...NORTHERN SMITH...JACKSON...CLAY...MACON AND EAST CENTRAL TROUSDALE COUNTIES... At 122 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Celina to 8 miles northwest of Carthage, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Livingston, Carthage, Celina, Gainesboro, Red Boiling Springs, Moss, Whitleyville, Dixon Springs, Pleasant Shade, Dale Hollow Lake and Standing Stone State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for Middle Tennessee. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Jackson; Macon; Overton; Smith; Trousdale
